content:

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: AE-0107, Description: back pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: non_statin
- AE ID: AE-0108, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0109, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0110, Description: hepatocellular injury, Grade: 3, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PD-053, Description: Concomitant medication not recorded at visit, Severity: minor, Site: site_05
- PD ID: PD-054, Description: Dose modification without documented PI approval, Severity: moderate, Site: site_07
- PD ID: PD-055, Description: Informed consent version outdated by 1 revision, Severity: minor, Site: site_03

### Investigator Notes
- Study drug accountability reconciled, no discrepancies
- All CRFs current through prior visit cycle
- Protocol amendment v4.0 submitted to IRB: statin exclusion criterion added, CYP3A4 substrate screening required
- In-vitro CYP3A4 Ki data received: LNS-4821 Ki = 0.8 uM, consistent with clinical DDI magnitude

### Events
- CRO quarterly oversight report submitted
- Site 06 new coordinator onboarding completed
- Investigator meeting minutes distributed
- Protocol amendment v4.0 submitted to central IRB

### Notes
- Week 26: Protocol amendment v4.0 under IRB review/approval. Statin subjects transitioning.
